description:
Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill`s self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!
Crisis desesperada ¡El combate frenético de Luffy!
Eine ausweglose Situation! – Der heiße Kampf auf Silver Mine!
Situation désespérée. Le combat décisif de Luffy dans une chaleur extrême
Situazione disperata - Scontro finale a Silver Mine
Zettaizetsumei: Luffy Kyokugen no Shakunetsu Kessen
Отчаянное положение! Луффи сражается в экстремальной жаре!
وضع يائس! يخوض لوفي معركة في حرارة مستعرّة!
絶体絶命 ルフィ極限の灼熱決戦
